cast.overview: Edmond Dantes becomes the target of a sinister plot and is arrested on his wedding day for a crime he did not commit. After 14 years in the island prison of Château d’If, he manages a daring escape. Now rich beyond his dreams, he assumes the identity of the Count of Monte-Cristo and exacts his revenge on the three men who betrayed him.
cast.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
cast.character: un convive du repas chez les Morcef

details.biography:
Laurent Dassault is a French billionaire businessman, and the co-managing director of Dassault Group, founded by his grandfather, Marcel Dassault.

As of October 2021, his estimated net worth was US$8.6 billion.

Dassault is married, with two children, and lives in Paris, France.

Source: Article "Laurent Dassault" from Wikipedia in English, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
details.name: Laurent Dassault
